Data wrangling

combine_years()
Combine years of data
select_data()
Select variables and apply filters
num_sim()
Simulate single years from age/time category

Chained multiple imputation of a set of variables
prop_summary()
Summarise the percentages of people with certain levels of a variable
clean_surveyweights()
Process the survey weights
impute_mean()
Fills missing values with subgroup mean value

Data

imdq_to_townsend
Probabilistic mapping of Index of Multiple Deprivation to Townsend quintiles
abv_data
Alcohol content assumptions
alc_volume_data
Beverage volume assumptions
impute_kids_model
Multinomial model of number of kids in the household 2012-2014
per_capita_alc_for_upshift
Per capita sales of alcohol for use in upshifting procedure from HMRC data on duty receipts disaggregated by UK nation
per_capita_alc_for_upshift_scotland
Per capita sales of alcohol for use in upshifting procedure from MESAS data on alcohol sales in Scotland.
